name: ISMP Website
description: The homepage of Intelligent System/Media Processing Lab.

name: PTT Search Engine
description: A vertical search engine based on the data crawled by PTT crawler, which is another project of mine. This website is built with Python, Tornado and Bootstrap. The search engine has used several text mining techniques, such as TD-IDF and indexing.

name: Cloud Video
description: A cloud video surveillance system based on Hadoop HDFS.

name: Fit Maniac
description: A fitness app offering weight training and dieting programs designed by professional fitness trainers.

name: Portalite
description: An Android app for the learning management system of YZU. It provides a elegant UI and off-line browsing.

name: Fakebook
description: A facebook-like website for practice. This website is built with PHP.
